metadata.section_summary: 本节主要介绍了钛动科技的产品——UniAgency。UniAgency是一个出海广告智能服务平台，提供出海广告账户管理、广告优化、投放数据与报告、创意素材管理等功能，同时还提供专属顾问、投放托管、创意设计等增值服务。该平台旨在帮助客户解决海外广告管理中的痛点和难点，提高广告营销效率。

__data__.text:
UniAgency产品简介
**​**[**UniAgency**](https://business.uniagency.net/)是钛动科技打造的出海广告智能服务平台，提供出海广告账户管理，广告优化，投放数据与报告，创意素材管理等功能；同时提供专属顾问、投放托管、创意设计等增值服务。帮助客户解决海外广告管理中的痛点，难点，提高广告营销效率。  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-legacy-files/o/assets%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2F-MQv5cMj3hAtPlzdWlPy%2F-MQvCczp0MmM4tHAeVQO%2Fimage.png?alt=media&token=2e9d2a27-aa24-4e91-9934-17690f045408)

metadata.section_summary: 本节内容主要是广州钛动科技股份有限公司的广告合规管理制度，包括总则、广告内容、相关标准要求和特定内容限制等四个部分。总则部分明确了广告主、广告经营者、广告发布者的定义和责任，以及广告内容的基本要求。广告内容部分详细规定了广告内容的原则、禁止性内容、相关标准要求和特定内容限制。相关标准要求部分规定了广告的可识别性、附带赠送商品或服务的明示要求、行政许可的符合性、引证内容的真实性和准确性、专利产品或方法的标明等要求。特定内容限制部分主要是对推广或提及酒类商品的广告的限制。

__data__.text:
钛动科技 广告合规管理制度（简版）
**二〇二三年六月**  
**广州钛动科技股份有限公司**  
**广告合规管理制度**  
##  
第一章 总则[](#di-yi-zhang-zong-ze)  
-   1.  
为了保证广州钛动科技股份有限公司（以下简称“公司”）客户推广内容符合国家相关法律、法规和和规范性文件的规定，同时促进网络营销推广行业的健康发展，保护用户的合法权益，现根据相关法律、法规的规定制定本制度。  
-   2.  
在本制度中，相关主体所具有的含义如下：  
（一）“广告主”，是指为推销商品或者服务，自行或者委托他人设计、制作、发布广告的自然人、法人或者其他组织；  
（二）广告经营者，是指接受委托提供广告设计、制作、代理服务的自然人、法人或者其他组织；  
（三）广告发布者，是指为广告主或者广告主委托的广告经营者发布广告的自然人、法人或者其他组织；  
（四）广告代言人，是指广告主以外的，在广告中以自己的名义或者形象对商品、服务作推荐、证明的自然人、法人或者其他组织。  
-   3.  
广告主、广告经营者、广告发布者从事广告活动，应当遵守法律、法规，诚实信用，公平竞争。  
-   4.  
相关广告不得含有虚假或者引人误解的内容，不得欺骗、误导消费者。广告主应当对广告内容的真实性负责。  
-   5.  
广告主应保护用户免受不安全和歧视行为的侵害，并尽力促成积极的用户体验。  
-   6.  
广告主须遵循本制度和所涉及广告发布者（包括但不限于Facebook、Google、TikTok等媒体平台）的广告发布守则等广告合规管理制度。  
##  
第二章 广告内容[](#di-er-zhang-guang-gao-nei-rong)  
###  
第一节 原则[](#di-yi-jie-yuan-ze)  
-   7.  
广告主、广告发布者、广告经营者及广告发言人应当安全地使用广告工具，并为使用相关产品和服务的每一位用户构建友好的平台环境。  
-   8.  
广告主、广告发布者、广告经营者及广告发言人应当恪守本公司的核心价值观，践行下列准则：保护用户免受不安全和歧视行为的侵害、保护用户免受欺诈或诈骗、倡导积极的用户体验。  
-   9.  
相关广告不得存在《中华人民共和国广告法》所禁止的内容，包括但不限于：  
（一）使用或者变相使用国旗、国歌、国徽，军旗、军歌、军徽；  
（二）使用或者变相使用国家机关、国家机关工作人员的名义或者形象；  
（三）使用“国家级”、“最高级”、“最佳”等用语；  
（四）损害国家的尊严或者利益，泄露国家秘密；  
（五）妨碍社会安定，损害社会公共利益；  
（六）危害人身、财产安全，泄露个人隐私；  
（七）妨碍社会公共秩序或者违背社会良好风尚；  
（八）含有淫秽、色情、赌博、迷信、恐怖、暴力的内容；  
（九）含有民族、种族、宗教、性别歧视的内容；  
（十）妨碍环境、自然资源或者文化遗产保护；  
（十一）所适用司法管辖区的法律、行政法规规定禁止的其他情形。  
-   10.  
广告中对商品的性能、功能、产地、用途、质量、成分、价格、生产者、有效期限、允诺等或者对服务的内容、提供者、形式、质量、价格、允诺等有表示的，应当准确、清楚、明白。  
-   11.  
广告主、广告经营者、广告发布者所适用司法管辖区的法律、行政法规规定广告中应当明示的内容，应当显著、清晰表示。  
###  
第二节 禁止性内容[](#di-er-jie-jin-zhi-xing-nei-rong)  
-   12.  
除第九条所规定的内容之外，相关广告不得包含、倡导或推广违法或用户可能不会接受的内容，包括：  
（一）违法产品或服务；  
（二）错误信息（包括已被第三方核查机构辟谣的内容等）；  
（三）歧视性内容；  
（四）基于种族、族裔、原国籍、宗教信仰、性取向、种姓、生理性别、社会性别、性别认同、严重疾病、残疾或移民身份等特征声称某人或某一类人对他人的人身安全、健康或生存构成威胁的挑衅内容。  
-   13.  
相关广告不得包含、倡导或推广可能欺骗或误导用户的内容，包括：  
（一）具有欺骗或误导行为的（包括意图骗取用户的钱财或个人信息的）商品、服务、方案或机会；  
（二）旨在帮助用户实施作弊或欺骗行为的商品或服务；  
（三）有关健康、减肥或经济机会的不切实际的结果的承诺或建议；  
（四）常与具误导性或欺骗性促销活动联系在一起的金融产品和服务；  
（五）间谍软件、恶意软件或任何会导致意料外或欺骗性体验的软件；  
（六）不存在的功能。  
-   14.  
相关广告不得包含、倡导或推广可能对用户健康和安全造成负面影响的危险性内容，包括：  
（一）所在司法管辖区域认定为违禁或娱乐性药物，以及其他不安全物质、产品或补充剂的销售或使用；  
（二）武器、弹药或爆炸物的销售或使用；  
（三）烟草或尼古丁产品及相关用具的销售或使用，戒烟产品除外。  
-   15.  
相关广告不得包含、倡导或推广可能导致用户体验不佳并引起强烈反感的内容，包括：  
（一）成人内容，包括裸露内容、露骨或性暗示姿势的描述内容，或者属于过度性暗示或性挑逗的行为，以及成人用品和服务；  
（二）不雅语言；  
（三）劣质或破坏性内容，包括具有误导性的广告定位（例如使用过度炒作的标题或会引诱用户违心参与广告互动的提示），以及将用户引导至仅包含极少原创内容，且大部分为不相关或低品质广告内容的落地页；  
（四）明示或暗示个人特征的内容，包括直接或间接明示或暗示某人的种族、民族、宗教、信仰、年龄、性取向或行为、性别认同、残疾、身心健康状况（包括精神状态）、弱势群体经济状况、投票状态、工会成员身份、犯罪记录或姓名；  
（五）触目惊心、骇人听闻或过度暴力的内容；  
（六）出售人体器官内容。  
-   16.  
相关广告内容不得损害未成年人和残疾人的身心健康。  
-   17.  
相关广告内容不得贬低其他生产经营者的商品或者服务。  
-   18.  
禁止使用未授予专利权的专利申请和已经终止、撤销、无效的专利作广告。  
-   19.  
麻醉药品、精神药品、医疗用毒性药品、放射性药品等特殊药品，药品类易制毒化学品，以及戒毒治疗的药品、医疗器械和治疗方法，不得作广告。  
###  
第三节 相关标准要求[](#di-san-jie-xiang-guan-biao-zhun-yao-qiu)  
-   20.  
相关广告应当具有可识别性，能够使消费者辨明其为广告。  
-   21.  
广告中表明推销的商品或者服务附带赠送的，应当明示所附带赠送商品或者服务的品种、规格、数量、期限和方式。  
-   22.  
广告内容涉及的事项需要取得行政许可的，应当与许可的内容相符合。  
-   23.  
广告使用数据、统计资料、调查结果、文摘、引用语等引证内容的，应当真实、准确，并表明出处。引证内容有适用范围和有效期限的，应当明确表示。  
-   24.  
广告中涉及专利产品或者专利方法的，应当标明专利号和专利种类。未取得专利权的，不得在广告中谎称取得专利权。  
###  
第四节 特定内容限制[](#di-si-jie-te-ding-nei-rong-xian-zhi)  
-   25.  
推广或提及酒类商品的广告必须符合适用的司法管辖区法律，以及强制或既定的行业规范、准则、许可和审批。作为最低要求，该类广告不得以未满18岁的用户为目标受众。  
-   26.

metadata.section_summary: 本节内容主要规定了广告的内容和行为要求，包括医疗、药品、医疗器械广告的内容要求，性和生殖健康类产品或服务的广告要求，非处方药的广告要求，交友服务类广告的要求，减肥商品和服务的广告要求，信用卡、贷款或保险服务的广告要求等。同时，也规定了广告行为的要求，包括不得侵犯第三方知识产权，使用他人名义或形象的要求，不得使用非正当手段规避广告审核流程，提供的覆盖率、收视率、点击率、发行量等资料应当真实等。此外，还规定了广告的审核和监督管理要求，以及附则。

__data__.text:
医疗、药品、医疗器械广告不得含有下列内容：  
（一）表示功效、安全性的断言或者保证；  
（二）说明治愈率或者有效率；  
（三）与其他药品、医疗器械的功效和安全性或者其他医疗机构比较；  
（四）利用广告代言人作推荐、证明；  
（五）法律、行政法规规定禁止的其他内容。  
-   27.  
宣传诸如避孕用品和计划生育之类的性和生殖健康类产品或服务的广告必须定位18岁以上的受众，且不得强调性快感。  
-   28.  
推销非处方药的广告必须遵守适用的当地法律、强制或既定的行业规范、准则、许可和审批，并采用符合本地适用法律的年龄和国家/地区定位条件。作为最低要求，广告不得以未满18岁的用户为目标受众。  
-   29.  
交友服务类广告须遵守交友服务受众定位要求以及交友类广告发布准则。  
-   30.  
推广减肥商品和服务的广告仅能面向年满 18 岁的用户投放；推广整容手术的广告仅能面向年满 18 岁的用户投放；推广膳食、保健或草药类补品的广告仅能面向年满 18 岁的用户投放。  
-   31.  
推广信用卡、贷款或保险服务的广告只能定位年满18岁的用户，且不得在广告的目标位置（落地页）页面中直接请求输入任何个人身份识别信息。  
##  
第三章 广告行为[](#di-san-zhang-guang-gao-hang-wei)  
-   32.  
广告主、广告经营者、广告发布者不得实施侵害或侵犯任何第三方知识产权的行为。侵权行为包括但不限于推广或销售假冒产品，例如盗用商标（名称或标志）的产品，或模仿正品功能制造的仿品等，本制度倡导的行为包括：  
（一）在推广素材中露出第三方名称、logo或已经注册过的商标信息的，广告主应取得对应商标授权；  
（二）禁止使用未经授权或在授权范围以外的他人名义或肖像；  
（三）使用歌曲应在素材中标明歌曲名称；  
（四）禁止其他涉及侵权第三方权益的内容。  
-   33.  
广告主在广告中使用他人名义或者形象的，应当事先取得其书面同意；使用无民事行为能力人、限制民事行为能力人的名义或者形象的，应当事先取得其监护人的书面同意。  
-   34.  
广告不得使用非正当手段，故意规避本公司的广告审核流程，其中包括试图使用技术手段掩盖广告内容或目标位置页面（落地页）。  
-   35.  
广告发布者向广告主、广告经营者提供的覆盖率、收视率、点击率、发行量等资料应当真实。  
-   36.  
广告主、广告发布者不得使用定位选项来歧视、骚扰、煽动或蔑视用户，也不得采取掠夺性的广告宣传行为。  
-   37.  
广告主不得利用危机和争议事件以此牟取商业利益。  
-   38.  
广告主、广告经营者、广告发布者制作、发布、投放等广告行为不应侵害任何第三方的其他合法权益。  
##  
第四章 审核和监督管理[](#di-si-zhang-shen-he-he-jian-du-guan-li)  
###  
第一节 审核[](#di-yi-jie-shen-he)  
-   39.  
广告主发布的每一条广告都需遵照本广告合规管理制度接受本公司审核，广告被投放之后依然会被广告发布者再次审核。  
-   40.  
本公司的广告审核系统主要采用自动化审核与部分手动审核相结合的方式，确保本制度妥善执行。  
-   41.  
如果在审核流程中的任意环节发现违规，相应的广告将无法通过审核，并且相关业务账户或其资产也可能受限。  
-   42.  
如果广告主的广告未通过审核或认为其业务账户或其资产受限属于误判，广告主可申请对相关决定进行复审。  
-   43.  
在本公司审核过程中，广告主、广告发布者应当积极协助、配合，不得拒绝、阻挠。  
###  
第二节 监督和管理[](#di-er-jie-jian-du-he-guan-li)  
-   44.  
除了审核单个广告，本公司也会监控和调查广告主的行为，并针对违反本制度、合作平台广告守则或其他适用政策的广告主帐户施加限制。  
-   45.  
如果广告发布者、用户认为相关广告违反了我们的管理政策，可以向公司进行举报。  
-   46.  
消费者协会和其他消费者组织对违反本制度规定，侵害消费者合法权益，以及其他损害社会公共利益的行为，可以依法进行社会监督。  
##  
第五章 附则[](#di-wu-zhang-fu-ze)  
-   47.  
广告主有责任了解和遵守本制度、所签署合约条款和任何其他适用条款和准则中概述的政策，相关法律法规，以及自律广告发布准则（如适用）。  
-   48.  
因投放形式、内容多样化及相关法律法规的不时更新，本制度未能涵盖所有广告合规事项。  
-   49.  
本公司有权根据法律法规及运营需要，不断对本制度进行完善和调整，本制度始终以最新版本为依据，自新版本发布生效日起，旧版本自动废行。  
二〇二三年五月三十日

metadata.section_summary: 本节内容主要是UniAgency系统用户协议，包括一般条款、系统服务介绍、服务协议的生效与终止、服务变更、中断、终止、费用支付、广告服务、功能软件订阅、陈述和保证、协议违约和终止、不可抗力和责任免除、退款流程、知识产权和保密条款、协议的变更和解释以及争议解决等方面的内容。主要实体包括UniAgency系统、Tecdo Hong Kong Limited及其附属公司、用户、服务提供商、广告信息、产品和服务等。

__data__.text:
UniAgency System User Agreement
Thank you for using the UniAgency Self-Placement System; the UniAgency System is operated by Tecdo Hong Kong kong Limited and its affiliates, and will be provided by qualified service providers for specific products and services. By accessing, registering, editing or publishing advertising information or using our products or services (collectively referred to as "Services") on the System, you are deemed to have read and agreed to accept the following Service Agreement. If you do not agree to any of the following, please stop accessing the System immediately  
UniAgency System User Agreement was last updated on 2022/7/11.  
##  
1\. General[](#1.-general)  
The content of this agreement includes the text of the agreement and each individual service agreement, including but not limited to service introduction, effective time of service agreement, service change, interruption, termination, user privacy system, advertisement placement and other agreements. Unless otherwise expressly stated, any services provided by the UniAgency system are governed by this Agreement.  
##  
2\. Introduction to system services[](#2.-introduction-to-system-services)  
(1) Tecdo Hongkong Limited and its affiliates use the UniAgency system to provide users with various authorized channel platforms through the Internet, such as Facebook, Google, YouTube, Tiktok and other channel platforms. Users who apply for opening an account in the UniAgency system must have the legal qualifications of an entity enterprise, and have non-infringing imitation or officially authorized products developed by the user; considering the importance of the UniAgency system user services, the user understands and agrees: the user needs to Provide timely, detailed and accurate company information, and all originally entered company information will be referenced as registration information. If the information provided by the user is inaccurate, Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates reserve the right to terminate the user's use of UniAgency services. While enjoying UniAgency user services, users agree to accept various information services provided by UniAgency user services, including but not limited to EDM, SMS, information push and other services and activity information.  
(2) UniAgency system users entrust Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates to open an advertisement placement account for a certain channel displayed in the system. If UniAgency system users have other additional service requirements or unfinished matters, including but not limited to operating accounts on behalf of them, Optimized design, creative services, strategic consulting and other value-added services that can be realized by service providers in the UniAgency platform. The price of the value-added services is subject to the display on the website page; if other services on the website will be launched in the future, the specific content and form of the event will be based on The display on the website page shall prevail.  
(3) If the user chooses to use each/a service content published on this website, it is deemed to agree and accept the content of this agreement, and is willing to establish a cooperative relationship with the provider of each service, follow the UniAgency system rules, know and accept If the service price and service content violate the content of this agreement, Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates have the right to suspend or terminate the advertising service, and have the right to require the user to be liable for damages.  
##  
3\. Entry into force and termination of the service agreement[](#3.-entry-into-force-and-termination-of-the-service-agreement)  
(1) From the time of agreeing to this service agreement to the termination of the service, the user will place commercial advertisements on the channel platform (for specific channel resources, please refer to the website announcement and the channel platform selected by the user) in the UniAgency system. The user understands and agrees that Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates only act as the operator of the UniAgency system, and the user will establish a cooperative relationship with the party or affiliates that provide services on the UniAgency platform according to the service selected and the currency used. The partnership does not affect the rights and interests of users in the UniAgency system.  
(2) When UniAgency users voluntarily stop using the system services, they must notify Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates in writing 15 working days in advance, and the service can only be terminated after confirmation by Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates.  
##  
**4\.** Service change, interruption, termination[](#4.-service-change-interruption-termination)  
(1) Users know and agree that because this service involves Internet services, it may objectively be affected by unstable factors in various links. Therefore, any risk of service interruption, cancellation or termination caused by force majeure, computer virus or hacker attack, system instability, GSM network, Internet network, communication line and other reasons that cannot be predicted or controlled by the system, thereby causing the user UniAgency is not liable for damages.  
(2) The system needs to repair or maintain the platform or related equipment that provides network services on a regular or irregular basis; UniAgency is not responsible for any interruption within a reasonable time, but UniAgency should give advance notice as much as possible.  
(3) The user understands and agrees that, except as otherwise provided in this service agreement, in view of the particularity of network services, UniAgency system may change, interrupt or terminate part or all of network services, UniAgency does not need to assume any responsibility for this, but UniAgency Advance notice should be given as much as possible, and you should be given as much time as possible to process the benefits.  
(4) UniAgency has the right to publish and update the service content from time to time through the UniAgency system website, but UniAgency promises that such updated service content will not damage the user's existing rights and interests; the user knows and agrees that such updated service content and prices from time to time will constitute The user can choose the content of such services according to their needs and establish a cooperative relationship with the service provider; once the user chooses such services, it is deemed to be bound by this agreement and accepts the content and price of such services; if such services If the price fluctuates or adjusts, UniAgency will communicate with users in advance.  
##  
5\. Fee payment[](#5.-fee-payment)  
(1) Users will recharge in the UniAgency system according to their own needs, and recharge according to the minimum recharge amount indicated on the UniAgency system page.  
(2) The user knows and agrees that if he chooses other value-added services announced by the UniAgency system, he shall pay according to the price, content, payment method and other information indicated in the service item.  
(3) UniAgency will provide users with a variety of payment methods. These payment methods are implemented in accordance with the rules of the payment system provider, and these payment methods meet the qualification requirements. The user understands and agrees to pay in accordance with the UniAgency system and payment system prompts ; The user knows and agrees to choose a certain payment method, which means to accept the rules and requirements of the payment system.  
(4) The user understands and agrees that the advertising accounts opened by him are all overseas advertising accounts, and the amount of RMB paid by him will be settled into USD and recharged into his advertising account through a legal third-party payment system. Therefore, UniAgency and service providers will For the demand submitted by the user in the UniAgency system, a pro forma invoice (ie invoice) of the corresponding amount will be issued.  
(5) The user understands and agrees that Tecdo Hong Kong Limited and its affiliates have the right to suspend or terminate the provision of services to the user when the account balance in the user's UniAgency system is insufficient.  
(6) Users of UniAgency system shall prepay the relevant advertising expenses to Tecdo Hong Kong Kong Limited and its affiliated companies according to their own account opening and placement plans, and Tecdo Hong Kong Limited and its affiliated companies shall provide stamped vouchers or receipts of the prepayment.  
(7) Both parties agree to use UniAgency's system statistics (which can be viewed in \[Asset Management\] - Advertising Fee Detail List) as the basis for verification of the service content of this agreement. If the UniAgency system user disagrees with the advertisement consumption data, he/she shall raise the objection within 3 natural days after obtaining the data (if no objection is raised after the deadline, it shall be considered as no objection), and Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates shall provide the relevant data and basis to the UniAgency system user in time after receiving the objection for the UniAgency system user to Verification.  
##  
6\. Advertising services[](#6.-a-dvertising-services)  
(1) During the period of this agreement, after the user completes the recharge, Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates shall ensure that the UniAgency system users are provided with corresponding system services and its affiliates provide certain/various services, including but not limited to development and recharge, Services such as independent delivery, customer-selected optimization, etc. If the user has any objection to the service, he should submit a written request in a timely manner, and Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates shall report to Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates in accordance with the objections and requirements raised by the users of the UniAgency system. The resource platform will coordinate, communicate or appeal, and both parties will negotiate and resolve the objection; if the UniAgency system user does not submit a written submission in a timely manner, it will be deemed that there is no objection.  
(2) During the advertising period, if there is a need for optimization of the projects of the users of UniAgency system users, users can choose to use them according to the service content published on the website. The service standards are communicated in a timely manner and the corresponding optimization settings are made, so that the advertising effect of UniAgency system users can meet the customer's expectations as much as possible.  
(3) If UniAgency system users conduct illegal operations (including but not limited to violations of this contract, violation of any laws, regulations, policies, public ethics and media regulations, etc.), UniAgency has the right to immediately take the following actions before notifying users. Measures: All accounts under the same entity will be permanently closed and offline, and the paid account opening fee, service fee, handling fee, deposit, etc. will not be returned. If the advertising platform imposes liquidated damages on the user's advertising account due to the user's own reasons (specifically, the user receives the notification from the advertising platform), the liquidated damages are all borne by the user. At the same time, the user must pay a fine to Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates, and the fine is charged at USD 1,000 per advertising account.  
##  
7\. Function software subscription[](#7.-function-software-subscription)  
(1) Subscription service content: After users receive a free experience or pay for a subscription service, they can continue to access UniAgency's reports and subscription content within a certain service period, and can experience new functions first.  
(2) Instructions for subscription payment: The user understands and agrees that the subscription service is a paid service, and UniAgency will charge a fee for the use of value-added services. Users can check the specific period of subscription services and the corresponding fees on the relevant service page and choose the type of service by themselves. After the subscription function is turned on, regardless of whether the user actually uses the service or accesses electronic content within the corresponding service period, the paid fees cannot be refunded. At the same time, UniAgency has the right to revise the charging standards and rules related to membership subscription services from time to time at its own discretion. Such standards and rules will take effect once they are published and constitute an effective part of these terms. If the user does not agree with the aforementioned standards, rules and their revisions, the user has the right to stop using the subscription service. If the user continues to use the subscription service, it is deemed to have agreed to the relevant content.  
(3) If a user of UniAgency system carries out illegal operation (including but not limited to violation of this agreement, violation of any laws, regulations, policies, public moral codes and media regulations and other violations), UniAgency has the right to take the following measures immediately before notifying the user: all accounts under the same subject will be permanently blocked and taken offline, and the account opening fees, service fees, handling fees and deposits paid will not be returned. The account opening fee, service fee, handling fee and deposit paid will not be refunded. If the advertising platform imposes a default fee on the user's advertising account due to the user's own reasons (subject to the user's receipt of the notification from the advertising platform), the default fee shall be fully borne by the user. At the same time, the User shall pay a penalty fee to Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliated companies at the rate of US$1,000 per advertising account.  
(4) The User shall be responsible for developing and maintaining its own customer network and assisting its customers to place advertisements on the media platform through the services provided by the UniAgency system. At the same time, the user shall handle all legal relationships with its clients and bear full legal responsibility for the actions and faults of its clients; UniAgency System shall not bear any responsibility for the legal relationships between our clients and between us and our clients, and the user shall compensate for any losses caused to UniAgency.  
##  
8\. Representations and warranties[](#8.-representations-and-warranties)  
(1) Since the user chooses to agree to this agreement, both parties declare, represent and warrant to each other as follows:  
(2) It is a legally established and validly existing company and is qualified to engage in the transaction under this contract, and the transaction complies with the provisions of its business scope;  
(3) It has full authority to enter into this contract and has the ability to perform its obligations under this contract; and such performance of obligations does not violate any restrictions on its binding legal documents;  
##  
9\. Agreement breach and termination[](#9.-agreement-breach-and-termination)  
From and after User elects to agree to this Agreement, the parties represent, represent and warrant to each other that.  
(1) It is a legally established and validly existing corporation and is qualified to engage in the transactions under this Agreement, and such transactions are within the scope of its business.  
(2) It may enter into this Agreement at its sole discretion and is capable of performing its obligations hereunder; and that such performance is not in violation of any legal document binding upon it.  
(3) The User shall be fully responsible for the account opening materials submitted (including but not limited to the name of the account opening company, address of the account opening company, business license, etc.) and guarantee that it has obtained the corresponding full authorization, and if UniAgency suffers from any third party's rights recourse due to the User's insufficient authorization of the account opening materials, the User shall bear full legal responsibility.  
(4) The user guarantees that the product information and advertising content (not limited to pictures, text, fonts, video, audio, etc.) placed by the user are true, legal and legitimate, and that the user enjoys full intellectual property rights or the corresponding legal license to use them during the advertising period, and that they will not violate any laws, rules, regulations, policies, public moral codes, or the policies of the country or region where the advertising is placed. UniAgency's policy, the advertising regulations of the delivery channel/media platform, and the legitimate rights and interests of any third party.  
​  
##  
10\. Breach of Agreement and Cancellation[](#10.-breach-of-agreement-and-cancellation)  
(1) From the time the user chooses to agree to this Agreement, the user and UniAgency may make changes and modifications to this Agreement after reaching a written agreement to confirm the agreement.  
(2) Unless otherwise agreed in this Agreement, any violation or non-compliance of any agreement in this Agreement by UniAgency during the cooperation period shall result in economic losses (the "losses" referred to in this Agreement include, but not limited to, economic losses, litigation costs, attorney's fees, security fees, notary fees, audit fees, security guarantee fees, travel fees, appraisal fees and other reasonable costs for the defense of rights) caused by UniAgency.  
(3) The user shall not cancel the agreement at will; if it is necessary to cancel the agreement, the user shall inform the UniAgency system user in writing 15 working days in advance, and the agreement shall be cancelled only after confirmation by the UniAgency system user, but the orders already confirmed by both parties or orders already placed by the UniAgency system user with Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliated companies shall be executed in accordance with this agreement. still be executed in accordance with this Agreement.  
(4) UniAgency system user and Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates agree that when the laws, administrative rules and regulations under which this agreement is concluded change, both parties shall negotiate to change the relevant content; when the objective circumstances under which this agreement is concluded change significantly, which makes the performance of this agreement impossible, after UniAgency system user and Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates  
(5) Either party may terminate this Agreement due to bankruptcy, legal liquidation or liquidation of one of the parties to this Agreement and shall notify the other party in writing, but both parties shall still perform their outstanding obligations to each other.  
##  
11\. Force majeure and exclusion of liability[](#11.-force-majeure-and-exclusion-of-liability)  
(1) Force majeure means an event which is beyond human control, unforeseeable or unavoidable even if encountered, which prevents, affects or delays the performance by either party of all or part of its obligations under the Agreement. Such events include, but are not limited to, acts of government, natural disasters, war, and epidemics. Given the special nature of the Internet, force majeure also includes the following circumstances that affect the normal operation of the Internet: (1) computer viruses; (2) hacker attacks; (3) network failures; (4) significant impacts caused by service delays, service barriers, or technical adjustments of bandwidth or other network equipment or technology providers; (5) server failures; (6) power failures; and (7) failures of recharge systems. If the advertisement placement service under this Agreement involves placement overseas (i.e. in countries or regions other than mainland China (excluding Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan)), force majeure also includes: (1) changes in China's control policies on overseas trade; (2) implementation or changes in relevant laws, regulations, policies, controls, trade restrictions on China in the country or region to which the advertisement placement destination or placement channel/media platform belongs; (3) New or changed international treaties, etc.; (4) Changes in the policies of the media platform where the advertisement is placed or problems with its advertising qualifications, etc.  
(2) The party that cannot perform this Agreement due to force majeure shall notify the other party of the cause of force majeure and its predicted impact within three business days from the date of occurrence of the force majeure. In addition, the party who is unable to perform this Agreement due to force majeure shall perform its obligations under this Agreement as soon as possible after the cause of force majeure is removed. If a party is unable to perform or there is no longer any point in performing its obligations due to force majeure, or if the force majeure continues for more than 90 days, either party may terminate this Agreement by written notice to all other parties, except for the advertising service that Party B has completed before it becomes aware of the force majeure, or the advertising service that has placed a placement plan or order with the placement channel/media platform.  
##  
12、Refund process[](#12-refund-process)  
If a user needs to cancel or terminate the system service in advance according to the aforementioned terms and conditions, the user can apply for a refund after UniAgency verifies whether his or her advertising account is suspected of irregularities and account arrears, if the balance of the user's account still exists. Refunds need to follow the following rules.  
(1) When users stop using the system service on their own initiative, they must inform Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliated companies in writing 15 working days in advance and contact the relevant CM for account suspension.  
(2) The service can be terminated only after UniAgency confirms that all the advertising accounts under the user and its affiliated entities have been settled. If there is any outstanding amount in the account, UniAgency has the right to deduct it directly from the balance of any of the user's account; if the balance is not sufficient to pay the entire outstanding amount, the user shall pay it to the designated If the balance is not enough to pay the whole amount, the user should pay it to the designated bank account within 15 working days after receiving UniAgency's notice.  
(3) If UniAgency has issued an invoice to the user for a certain part of the payment, no refund will be accepted for that part of the payment.  
(4) The above amount returned to the user's account in RMB or USD, depending on the user's initial top-up currency, and the refund will be completed within 30 working days from the date of the user's application for refund.  
##  
13、Intellectual property and confidentiality clause[](#13-intellectual-property-and-confidentiality-clause)  
(1) All hardware, software, programs, passwords, trade names, technologies, licenses, patents, trademarks, technical knowledge, etc. used by UniAgency and system users belong to the owners of each party, and there is no defect of rights, the rest of the parties and third parties do not have any rights or interests in this regard.  
(2) Confidential information or information, trade secrets, technical secrets, etc. (hereinafter referred to as "Confidential Information") of the other party that either party has knowledge of or access to as a result of the signing or performance of this Agreement shall not be disclosed or made public to third parties during the term of the Agreement or after the termination of the Agreement.  
(3) The confidentiality obligations stipulated in this Article shall remain in effect until after the termination of this Agreement.  
##  
14、Change and Interpretation of the Agreement[](#14-change-and-interpretation-of-the-agreement)  
(1) This Agreement shall be effective from the time the system user agrees to it. In case of modification or change, Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliated companies shall notify it in the UniAgency system and confirm it by the user.  
(2) Changes in laws, regulations or judicial interpretations that cause any provision in this Agreement to become illegal, invalid or lose enforceability shall also not affect the legality, validity or enforceability of other provisions of this Agreement. In such case, the parties shall negotiate in good faith to replace the illegal, invalid or unenforceable provision with the one that best achieves its purpose and objectives as soon as possible.  
(3) This Agreement is written in Chinese and the headings attached to each provision are for convenience of reference only and shall not affect the interpretation of each provision.  
(4) The content and rules displayed on the UniAgency system website, together with this agreement, constitute the content of cooperation with users.  
##  
15、Dispute resolution[](#15-dispute-resolution)  
(1) The laws of the People's Republic of China shall apply to this agreement.  
(2) This agreement is based on the mutual trust and understanding between the parties for honest performance. If any party violates the provisions of this Agreement or disagrees with the interpretation of this Agreement, the parties shall negotiate in good faith and then settle the matter. If the negotiation fails, either party shall have the right to file a lawsuit with the People's Court of Tianhe District, Guangzhou, where the agreement is performed.

metadata.section_summary: 本节主要介绍了UniAgency的用户隐私政策。首先，UniAgency明确了其对用户隐私的尊重，并承诺不会泄露、编辑或公开用户在UniAgency系统中的注册信息、交易数据等非公开内容，除非法律要求。然后，定义了一些关于隐私政策的关键词，如“账户”、“Cookies”、“个人数据”、“使用数据”等。接着，详细说明了UniAgency如何收集和使用用户的个人数据，包括通过移动设备访问服务时自动收集的信息，以及通过Google Analysis收集的信息。此外，还列出了UniAgency可能收集的个人数据类型，如电子邮件地址、姓名、电话号码、地址等。最后，UniAgency阐述了其对个人数据的使用、保留、转移、披露和保护等方面的政策。

__data__.text:
User Privacy Policy
##  
Privacy Policy[](#privacy-policy)  
Our Privacy Policy was last updated on 2022/5/23.  
The user fully understands, irrevocably grants Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates the following rights free of charge: Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates allow UniAgency users to log in to the system of its affiliates or partner companies and use its Services.  
Any behavior of UniAgency users in affiliated companies or cooperative companies must comply with the stipulations and rules of this user agreement, as well as instructions and operating guidelines for the correct use of services. In order to realize the above functions, the user agrees that UniAgency will synchronize its registration information, transaction/payment data and other information and data in the UniAgency system to the system of Tecdo Hong kong Limited and its affiliates or partner companies and allow them to use it.  
Respecting the privacy of users is a basic policy implemented by UniAgency. Therefore, UniAgency will not disclose, edit or disclose the user's supplementary information and non-public content stored in the UniAgency system user service as information such as user registration information, supplementary materials, transaction delivery data, etc., unless required by law.  
​  
###  
Interpretation and Definitions[](#interpretation-and-definitions)  
####  
Interpretation[](#interpretation)  
The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.  
####  
Definitions[](#definitions)  
For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:  
-   "**Account**" means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.  
-   "**Cookies**" are small files that are placed on Your computer, mobile device or any other device by a website, containing the details of Your browsing history on that website among its many uses.  
-   "**Personal Data**" is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.  
For the purposes of GDPR, Personal Data means any information relating to You such as a name, an identification number, location data, online identifier or to one or more factors specific to the physical, physiological, genetic, mental, economic, cultural or social identity. For the purposes of the CCPA, Personal Data means any information that identifies, relates to, describes or is capable of being associated with, or could reasonably be linked, directly or indirectly, with You.  
-   "**Usage Data**" refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).  
-   **"You"** means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.  
##  
Collecting and Using Your Personal Data[](#collecting-and-using-your-personal-data)  
###  
How We Collect Users’ Information[](#how-we-collect-users-information)  
When You access the Service by or through a mobile device, We may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device You use, Your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of Your mobile device, Your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser You use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.  
We may also collect information that Your browser sends whenever You visit our Service or when You access the Service by or through a mobile device.  
We may also use Google Analysis that assists us with analysing the usage of our website and help to improve the service quality of our website. For the personal information that may be collected by Google Analysis and its processing activities, please visit: https://support.google.com/analytics/answer/6004245?hl=en&ref\_topic=2919631.  
​  
###  
**Types of Data Collected**[](#types-of-data-collected)  
####  
Personal Data[](#personal-data)  
While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:  
-   Email address  
-   First name and last name  
-   Phone number  
-   Address, State, Province, ZIP/Postal code, City  
-   Usage Data  
####  
Usage Data[](#usage-data)  
Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service.  
Usage Data may include information such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that You visit, the time and date of Your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.  
####  
Cookies[](#cookies)  
Uniagency only uses the following two type of cookies for the following purposes.  
**Preferences cookies**\- Uniagency solely uses the preferences cookie to remember your set-up in the past in order to optimize the information presented to you.  
**Statistics cookies**\- Uniagency also uses third party cookie of Google Analytics for purpose of helping us understand how the website is being used. Google Analytics collects first-party cookies, data related to the device/browser, IP address and on-site/app activities to measure and report statistics about user interactions. Google uses Google Analytics to provide the Google Analytics measurement service to Uniagency. For more information about the Google Analytics cookies, please read [here](https://support.google.com/analytics/answer/6004245?hl=en).  
##  
Use of Your Personal Data[](#use-of-your-personal-data)  
Uniagency may use Personal Data for the following purposes:  
-   **To provide and maintain our Service,** including to monitor the usage of our Service.  
-   **To manage Your Account**: to manage Your registration as a user of the Service. The Personal Data You provide can give You access to different functionalities of the Service that are available to You as a registered user.  
-   **For the performance of a contract**: the development, compliance and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items or services You have purchased or of any other contract with Us through the Service. To contact You:  
-   **To contact You** by email**,** telephone calls, SMS, or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as a mobile application's push notifications regarding updates or informative communications related to the functionalities, products or contracted services, including the security updates, when necessary or reasonable for their implementation.  
Uniagency may share Your personal information in the following situations:  
-   **With Service Providers**: We may share Your personal information with Service Providers (e.g. cloud service provider, analysis service provider, etc.)to monitor and analyze the use of our Service, for payment processing, to contact You.  
-   **With Your consent:** We may disclose Your personal information for any other purpose with Your consent.  
##  
Retention of Your Personal Data[](#retention-of-your-personal-data)  
Uniagency will retain Your Personal Data only for one year. We will retain and use Your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.  
Personal information collected via Google Analytics, please confirm your retention periods through [here](https://support.google.com/analytics/answer/7667196?hl=en).  
Uniagency will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally retained for a shorter period of time, except when this data is used to strengthen the security or to improve the functionality of Our Service, or We are legally obligated to retain this data for longer time periods.Regarding retention of cookies, you can read more in our [cookie policy](/uniagency/user-privacy-policy#cookies)​  
##  
Transfer of Your Personal Data[](#transfer-of-your-personal-data)  
Your information, including Personal Data, is processed at the Uniagency's operating offices and in any other places where the parties involved in the processing are located. It means that this information may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of Your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from Your jurisdiction.  
Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by Your submission of such information represents Your agreement to that transfer.  
Uniagency will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that Your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of Your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of Your data and other personal information.  
##  
**Disclosure of Your Personal Data**[](#disclosure-of-your-personal-data)  
We may use selected third parties to provide us with services who may have access to your personal information, including companies that assist with programming and technical aspects of hosting and operating the Uniagency Site, technical service provider (e.g. Google Analysis) that assists with analyzing the usage of our website, or email service provider. Our affiliates may also have access to your personal information including through or in connection with this TopPlayable Site for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.  
The servers used in the operation of the Uniagency Site automatically identify a computer by its IP address. Although, we will not be able to identify the computer using its IP address once you have left the Uniagency Site. If we, in good faith, determine that you have or are attempting to misuse or harm the Site, we may investigate and cooperate with appropriate law enforcement agencies to protect our rights or property.  
Similarly, we may share your personal information as required or permitted by law to comply with a subpoena or similar legal process or government request, or when we believe in good faith that disclosure is legally required or otherwise necessary to protect our rights and property, or the rights, property or safety of others, including to advisers, law enforcement agencies, judicial and regulatory authorities. We may also transfer your personal information to a third party that acquires all or part of our assets or shares, or that succeeds us in carrying on all or a part of our business, whether by merger, acquisition, reorganization or otherwise.  
##  
Security of Your Personal Data[](#security-of-your-personal-data)  
The security of Your Personal Data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your Personal Data, We cannot guarantee its absolute security.  
##  
Detailed Information on the Processing of Your Personal Data[](#detailed-information-on-the-processing-of-your-personal-data)  
####

YouTube[](#youtube)  
Some of our applications use YouTube API services, and you have agreed to the YouTube terms of service ([https://www.youtube.com/t/terms](https://www.youtube.com/t/terms)), privacy policy ([http://www.google.com/policies/privacy](http://www.google.com/policies/privacy)) and API Terms of Service ([https://developers.google.com/youtube/terms/api-services-terms-of-service](https://developers.google.com/youtube/terms/api-services-terms-of-service)) to use YouTube content and services through our app. We are not responsible for the content or privacy policies of any third-party services, and we encourage you to carefully review the privacy policies of any third-party services you visit.  
If you have authorized our application to access your information through the YouTube API service, in addition to our regular procedures for deleting stored data, you can also access the Google Security Settings page at [https://security.google.com/settings/security/permissions](https://security.google.com/settings/security/permissions) Revoke the authorization of the YouTube API service for our application.  
YouTube/Google user data: We do not collect and process personal data. Only store API service authorization information to complete the basic operations under authorization.  
##  
**Children's Privacy**[](#childrens-privacy)  
We ensure that we comply with the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) and any applicable law regarding Children. In addition, we will not knowingly collect any personal information that we know to be of children under the age which is specified under applicable law about children.  
If a parent or guardian becomes aware that his or her child has provided us with information without their consent, he or she should promptly contact us and we take reasonable steps to ensure that such information is deleted from our files.  
##  
Links to Other Websites[](#links-to-other-websites)  
Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If You click on a third party link, You will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit.  
We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.

metadata.section_summary:
This section provides a step-by-step guide on how to use the UniAgency product. It covers the process of signing up, logging in, applying for a Google Ads account, uploading a transfer voucher, and recharging the account. It also provides screenshots for each step to help users understand the process better. The section ends with a note encouraging users to study the help center and reach out to the support team if they need any help.

这个部分提供了如何使用UniAgency产品的逐步指南。它涵盖了注册、登录、申请Google广告账户、上传转账凭证和充值账户的过程。每个步骤都提供了截图，帮助用户更好地理解这个过程。最后，该部分鼓励用户进一步研究帮助中心，并在需要帮助时联系支持团队。

__data__.text:
Product Guidance
###  
1、Sign up[](#1-sign-up)  
When you visit UniAgency for the first time, you should register an account.  
​  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2F9pTdUPqN8Z639ygGWj4v%2F%E6%88%AA%E5%B1%8F2022-06-27%20%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%884.41.41.png?alt=media&token=8f55c4ae-075b-4a4c-8e46-a0d7723285c9)  
​  
###  
2、Log in[](#2-log-in)  
When you have already registered an account, you can input your phone number and password to start enjoying our product service  
​  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FdtotOPcJEKotvBj0V2s9%2F%E6%88%AA%E5%B1%8F2022-06-27%20%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%884.50.50.png?alt=media&token=b6b70e2b-4207-4d82-ac37-c0ef091be24e)  
​  
###  
3、Apply Account[](#3-apply-account)  
We support you to apply Google Ads account.  
There are two entrances you can access to apply account.  
Notice: When you apply account for the first time, you should fill some info to verify your company.(finish 3 steps)  
​  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FwoZoJca2ii1XPgg3mZrq%2F%E6%88%AA%E5%B1%8F2022-06-27%20%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%885.30.16.png?alt=media&token=2d07d233-c3d8-4766-8b14-e4d3376835a7)  
​  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FgWS3EXGKBIPpznIMsnEq%2F%E6%88%AA%E5%B1%8F2022-06-27%20%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%885.30.28.png?alt=media&token=b3e6341d-53ed-48b8-81f1-81d85e09aebd)  
​  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2F5LI8GtbpDTPANKnxs8qX%2F%E6%88%AA%E5%B1%8F2022-06-27%20%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%885.30.45.png?alt=media&token=c4acc6ce-7154-4ec4-b4f4-043b49c414cc)  
​  
####  
Entrance1:[](#entrance1)  
When you firstly visit our product or haven't applied any media account successfully , we recommend you to click APPLY ACCOUNT (shown below)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2F1jcRZoUTtUTFeDC7ukmq%2FGoogle%20Ads%20%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7.png?alt=media&token=76f39df8-ae3b-467b-8cb7-9b95ff8b6092)  
####  
Entrance2:[](#entrance2)  
Please follow 3 steps  
step1 : Account Management  
step2: Account Application  
step3: Apply Account  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FQdgVNM6yCCkyIEukOowX%2FGG%20%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7.png?alt=media&token=30210c9b-00ee-489c-9e23-f26c173228c6)  
Now, you need to provide us compulsory information for account application.  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FZIudwnX9kRiYgJwojs9H%2Fscreencapture-business-uniagency-net-application-apply-google-2022-06-27-18_18_59.png?alt=media&token=7a74667a-532b-4d1e-bc8c-9c117d5c8d4a)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2F1DKOTZ1HhgyHfRje9xNm%2Fimage.png?alt=media&token=1de8c15c-7256-43b4-98d1-74776e5596d7)  
Congratulations !! You have successfully submitted account application. Next you will need to make payment to our HSBC Hong Kong account （ You can ask your business manager for the exact amount ）and upload transfer voucher.  
###  
4、Transfer Voucher Uploading[](#4-transfer-voucher-uploading)  
Please follow these steps.  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FwzCNogLZuj7WHpQ6AyKB%2F%E4%BA%A4%E6%98%93%E6%94%AF%E4%BB%98.png?alt=media&token=70489322-03d7-43e2-a749-8d84a6fd1ce7)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2F7Gn1jYcaPrYUOsoIVJtC%2F%E6%88%AA%E5%B1%8F2022-06-27%20%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%887.21.55.png?alt=media&token=54dbd051-21a3-4e3c-aa76-f24bbd325e6c)  
After uploading transfer voucher, our finance will review it. Once we confirm that the amount transferred is the same as the amount we actually received, we will add the same amount to your UniAgency account balance, which can be used for advertising account recharge  
###  
5、Recharge account[](#5-recharge-account)  
When you obtain an advertising account，you can use your balance to top up your advertising account.  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FwPNLG88WvgUgOAfcTfRo%2F%E6%88%AA%E5%B1%8F2022-06-27%20%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%8810.03.04.png?alt=media&token=d8b559ed-d3ae-4412-851e-909ffd11fcfe)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2F7hlPBOnJlR2k4cHamdxx%2F%E6%88%AA%E5%B1%8F2022-06-27%20%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%8810.03.53.png?alt=media&token=60f71aa4-af2c-4a28-87ed-9bb474775611)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2Fcd2yPGge30VgCsdu5xnr%2F%E6%88%AA%E5%B1%8F2022-06-27%20%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%8810.04.07.png?alt=media&token=0ac0fc10-9af3-40f0-be58-9f069d03de88)  
After completing advertising account recharge, you can login in the Google Ads platform to place ads.  
​  
> **Study our help center further and reach out to us if you need any help ;)**
>
> ​[Google广告政策](/media/google-ads/google-ads-policies) Google Ads Policy
>
> ​[Google广告帐号违规](/media/google-ads/google-ads-policies-guidance/google-guang-gao-zhang-hao-wei-gui) Advertising Account Violation Guidelines  
**If you face any difficulties using our product, please contact our support team in Intercom chat or the business manager. We will give you a hand.**

metadata.section_summary: 本节主要是钛动科技公司对客户的反欺诈温馨提示。主要内容包括：不要轻信非钛动科技员工的汇款通知，不要向非钛动科技的银行账户汇款，不要点击陌生汇款链接，不要接听冒充钛动科技员工的陌生电话。钛动科技收款账号的变更会通过书面方式通知客户，任何非钛动科技书面的通知均为骗局。钛动科技服务客户的唯一收款账户为香港钛动有限公司，账户号码为741321392838，银行名称为汇丰银行。钛动科技所有的微信服务群均有两名以上的钛动科技员工在群服务。如果发现钛动科技员工违规行为，可以向钛动科技进行举报。

反欺诈温馨提示
尊敬的客户您好，为配合国家机关反诈宣传，避免电信诈骗，保障双方安全诚信合作，温馨提示您：  
【一】、请勿轻信**非钛动科技员工**的短信、邮件、微信等方式的汇款通知，工作对接请通过合同指定邮箱及电话联系； 【二】、请勿向非钛动科技的银行账户汇款，请勿点击陌生汇款链接，请勿接听冒充钛动科技员工的陌生电话。  
【三】、请以合同约定的汇款账户进行汇款，勿向任何陌生账户汇款  
【四】、钛动科技收款账号的变更均会通过**书面方式**通知客户，任何非钛动科技书面的通知均为骗局。 钛动科技服务客户的唯一收款账户为：  
**ACCOUNT NAME：TECDO HONG KONG LIMITED**  
**账户名称： 香港钛动有限公司**  
**ACCOUNT NO： 741321392838**  
**账户号码：741321392838**  
**BANK NAME：HSBC Hong Kong Commercial Banking**  
**银行名称：汇丰银行**  
**BANK ADDRESS：1 Queen's Road Central, Hong Kong**  
**银行地址：香港皇后大道中1号**  
**SWIFT CODE：HSBCHKHHHKH**  
**银行代码：HSBCHKHHHKH**  
**BRANCH CODE：741**  
**分行代码： 741**  
**BANK CODE：004**  
**银行代码：004**  
为保证服务质量，钛动科技所有的微信服务群均有**两名以上的钛动科技员工**在群服务。工作交流可在群内交流，请勿私下与任何钛动科技员工有金钱往来。若发现钛动科技员工违规行为，均可向钛动科技进行举报。  
非常感谢贵司一直以来对钛动科技的大力支持，每一位客户都是钛动科技宝贵的财富，钛动科技将会继续用优质的服务帮助您在出海的赛道上走得更稳、更快、更远！

metadata.section_summary: 本节内容主要介绍了如何进行注册。首先，用户需要访问注册页面，然后填写注册表单，其中带有“*”标识的为必填选项。用户需要验证手机号，并且一个手机号、邮箱只能注册一个账号。最后，用户需要勾选已阅读并同意《UniAgency系统用户协议》并点击注册。提交成功后，用户需要等待专属顾问的联系。

__data__.text:
注册
##  
1.访问注册页面[](#1.-fang-wen-zhu-ce-ye-mian)  
-   访问[注册页面](https://business.uniagency.net/register)​  
##  
2.填写注册表单[](#2.-tian-xie-zhu-ce-biao-dan)  
填写注册表单，带“\*”标识的为必填选项：  
-   需要对您的手机号进行验证；  
-   一个手机号、邮箱仅能注册一个账号；  
勾选【我已阅读并同意《UniAgency系统用户协议》】，并点击注册。  
注册申请提交成功后，请等待专属顾问联系您。  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2F9wibIqnmUvJAo1QGBU0i%2Fimage.png?alt=media&token=2049715c-b580-4e37-a0d8-160c0c5f5a21)  
​

metadata.section_summary: 本节内容主要介绍了登录过程，包括访问登录界面、输入账号密码以及忘记密码的处理方法。首先，用户需要访问登录页面，然后输入注册时填写的手机号和对应密码进行登录。如果无法登录，可以尝试修改密码，或者咨询在线客服和专属顾问。如果忘记密码，可以点击“忘记密码？”并输入注册手机号获取验证码进行密码重置。

__data__.text:
登录
##  
1.访问登录界面[](#1.-fang-wen-deng-lu-jie-mian)  
-   访问[登录页面](https://business.uniagency.net/login)。  
##  
2.输入账号密码[](#2.-shu-ru-zhang-hao-mi-ma)  
-   输入注册时填写的手机号以及对应密码，点击登录。  
-   若无法登录请尝试修改密码，或咨询在线客服和专属顾问。  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2F1WK9xzsxJTZ5LY23AfaC%2Fimage.png?alt=media&token=870267e2-ab65-41e3-8b45-87b68e61701d)  
##  
3、忘记密码[](#3-wang-ji-mi-ma)  
-   若忘记密码，可点击【忘记密码?】  
-   输入注册手机号获取验证码进行密码重置。  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FCEytLfleisY3gndlnwEi%2Fimage.png?alt=media&token=49f281a5-a9c5-4c8c-af49-39a47c775e9e)

metadata.section_summary: 本节主要介绍了开户管理的相关内容，包括开户申请操作流程、开户申请以及开户记录的查看。首先，通过点击菜单栏的【开户管理】—【开户申请】，用户可以进入开户申请页面，选择相应的媒体平台进行开户申请。其次，用户也可以通过点击菜单栏的【开户管理】—【开户记录】，进入开户记录页面，选择相应的媒体平台、开户状态、公司名称和时间进行查询，查找到相应的开户记录。

__data__.text:
开户管理
##  
1\. 开户申请操作流程[](#1.-kai-hu-shen-qing-cao-zuo-liu-cheng)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-legacy-files/o/assets%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2F-MROe4odLc521YcQ_JH7%2F-MROejC7sxVPkEX0i4cm%2F%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7%E7%94%B3%E8%AF%B7%E6%B5%81%E7%A8%8B.png?alt=media&token=d88afd51-2a1e-439c-8d07-72118d1ce476)  
##  
2\. 开户申请[](#2.-kai-hu-shen-qing)  
###  
**选择媒体填写申请**[](#xuan-ze-mei-ti-tian-xie-shen-qing)  
-   点击菜单栏【开户管理】—【开户申请】，进入开户申请页面。

3\. 开户记录[](#3.-kai-hu-ji-lu)

metadata.section_summary: 本节主要介绍了Facebook开户申请的流程和操作步骤。首先，通过Uniagency专属入口进行开户申请，然后跳转至Facebook填写OE申请，最后在Uniagency查看审批进度。在申请操作中，详细介绍了如何在Facebook进行开户申请，包括点击菜单栏进行开户申请，查看开户前材料，输入公司信息，添加账户详情等步骤。此外，还提供了查看开户记录及审批结果，修改开户申请，查看下户账户等操作方法。最后，提醒用户在开户前，提交开户的BM以及邮箱需有粉丝页的管理员权限，否则在oe链接中无法选择相应的粉丝页。

__data__.text:
Facebook开户申请
##  
1\. 申请流程[](#1.-shen-qing-liu-cheng)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-legacy-files/o/assets%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2F-MlVU_YlX1j_j3pgqHH8%2F-MlVWgRlNDnLmNbJqNxy%2Fimage.png?alt=media&token=2fdfddd1-2c96-4124-9fa0-25fcbed96f14)  
Facebook开户申请流程  
（1）在Uniagency专属入口进行开户申请  
（2）跳转至Facebook填写OE申请  
（3）在Uniagency查看审批进度  
##  
2\. 申请操作[](#2.-shen-qing-cao-zuo)  
###  
2.1 Facebook 开户申请[](#2.1-facebook-kai-hu-shen-qing)  
Facebook将上线新的OE功能：  
-   根据Meta当前的政策自动拒绝低质量的OE开户申请  
-   自动验证广告主官网链接有效性  
-   提高对上传的营业执照图片的分辨率要求  
-   新增上传栏，供广告主上传补充的商业文件（非必须）  
####  
2.1.1 点击菜单栏【开户管理】—【开户申请】，进入开户申请页面。[](#2.1.1-dian-ji-cai-dan-lan-kai-hu-guan-li-kai-hu-shen-qing-jin-ru-kai-hu-shen-qing-ye-mian)  
-   选择Facebook，点击【开通申请】按钮，进入 Facebook OE 页面进行申请信息的填写。  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FG70cLi5DriFSnhoVhAJJ%2Ffb%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7%E7%94%B3%E8%AF%B7.png?alt=media&token=64df8750-d83e-4d06-b288-5117e2cc8a1b)  
####  
2.1.2 点击【开户须知】，查看开户前材料[](#2.1.2-dian-ji-kai-hu-xu-zhi-cha-kan-kai-hu-qian-cai-liao)  
-   点击【直接开户】按钮，进入 Facebook OE 页面进行申请信息的填写  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2F00SEULtkuUSowSObjufd%2F%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7%E9%A1%BB%E7%9F%A5.png?alt=media&token=fe34a56c-7523-4cbd-a023-df0505782e81)  
-   跳转OE链接，输入手机号登录Facebook（已登录的无需登录；如显示错误，则更换其他手机号登录）  
![](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FD3Z1eYAUqosL27qSvTGi%2Ffile.jpeg?alt=media)  
####  
2.1.3 输入公司信息[](#2.1.3-shu-ru-gong-si-xin-xi)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FrSs8hTTwV6GECfZ6sGno%2F%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B72.png?alt=media&token=473e7eab-fd89-4b10-9510-c42250ca37ef)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FXmr2Illb1WojlRdaNnQ5%2F%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B73.png?alt=media&token=7869862e-2615-48b0-be8b-7bfbaf138a89)  
上传其他支持性文件**非必填项**，可以选择上传有助广告帐户申请获批的任何补充商业文件。  
-   电商 - 线上店铺/业务帐户的所 有权证明（例如：店铺名称、地 址栏的截图和店铺页面的全屏 截图）  
-   公司或政府发布的公告或声明  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2Fzg65gDZO1Y5ia9SN7Fz3%2F%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B74.png?alt=media&token=8f2596cd-b510-4e7e-becc-e8b650162594)  
####  
2.1.4 添加账户详情[](#2.1.4-tian-jia-zhang-hu-xiang-qing)  
注意：单次申请最多提交3个账户、3条推广链接、3个粉丝页（公共主页）  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FFV2FND7aKxPuMgWrU7MH%2F%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B74.png?alt=media&token=7c10a579-61fb-42dd-91eb-9ba593a1ea44)  
创建Facebook粉丝页（公共主页）：命名需要与推广的域名/品牌保持一致  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FzCoYSlsmNEB6Rh7Jcf8V%2F%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B75.png?alt=media&token=2f8ab31f-5e08-4525-8b7e-d80d62fafd5c)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2F6ymOOyfNyFXHAvTtFodW%2F%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B76.png?alt=media&token=33559528-ebd9-4d4a-9d68-f8089d3db72e)  
####  
需注意：OE会自动审核网站链接，如果提交的链接无效，OE会自动驳回开户申请[](#xu-zhu-yi-oe-hui-zi-dong-shen-he-wang-zhan-lian-jie-ru-guo-ti-jiao-de-lian-jie-wu-xiao-oe-hui-zi-don)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FVCvYBsMzpmlX6DjABLm7%2Foe%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E5%AE%A1%E6%A0%B8%E7%BD%91%E7%AB%99.png?alt=media&token=000c1a02-5886-4887-ba6c-51b835fed501)  
完成提交，等待开户审核。（媒体下户时间一般为1-3个工作日）  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FN4WzOIx9C0jS9n9EZXm2%2F%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B77.png?alt=media&token=8eddbd47-8361-453c-9845-5e58c7eb1862)  
###  
2.2 查看开户记录及审批结果[](#2.2-cha-kan-kai-hu-ji-lu-ji-shen-pi-jie-guo)  
-   在Facebook oe链接填写提交后，返回UniAgency，可在“开户记录”中查看申请信息：点击列表“查看“按钮，查看单据信息。  
-   在开户记录页和开户记录详情页可查看开户状态：审核中、待修改、已驳回、已通过  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FcRwerwr7r7J6CrgNl3xJ%2F%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7%E5%AE%A1%E6%A0%B8%E4%B8%AD.png?alt=media&token=35616522-4a5c-485f-b777-41125c1b0726)  
###  
2.3 修改开户申请[](#2.3-xiu-gai-kai-hu-shen-qing)  
-   若开户申请被打回，可在UniAgency“开户记录”查看，开户状态为“待修改”。  
-   在列表页或详情页可查看代理或facebook的审批意见。  
-   点击“修改”，跳转Facebook oe链接进行修改。  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FJirWULp1T2E28oUh2Yk6%2F%E4%BF%AE%E6%94%B9%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7%E8%AE%B0%E5%BD%95.png?alt=media&token=d3d82a37-37f0-4ac0-b357-7ee4c4dc95e0)  
###  
2.4 查看下户账户[](#2.4-cha-kan-xia-hu-zhang-hu)  
-   Facebook审批通过后，可在UniAgency“开户记录”查看开户状态为“已通过”。  
-   点击“获取账户”可以查看下户账号；点击“立即充值”可对账户进行充值。  
##  
3\. 注意事项[](#3.-zhu-yi-shi-xiang)  
-   开户前，提交开户的 BM 以及邮箱（Facebook个人登录邮箱）需有粉丝页的管理员权限，否则在 oe 链接中无法选择相应的粉丝页！

Uniagency系统充值操作说明[](#uniagency-xi-tong-chong-zhi-cao-zuo-shuo-ming)  
​[充值申请操作说明](https://help.uniagency.net/uniagency/untitled-2)​  
##  
Uniagency系统开户申请入口：[](#uniagency-xi-tong-kai-hu-shen-qing-ru-kou)  
​[登录UniAgency免费开户](https://business.uniagency.net/#/login)​

【新手出海】极速下户指引[](#xin-shou-chu-hai-ji-su-xia-hu-zhi-yin)

metadata.section_summary: 本节主要介绍了在Facebook开户审核过程中需要注意的一些要点。首先，OE填写的信息需要与营业执照的信息保持一致，包括公司名称、社会统一信用代码、官网链接、主体英文名等。其次，一个主体可以推广多个产品，但一个产品只能被某个主体推广。推广规则需要遵循“同个品牌/产品”的原则，保持推广页和粉丝页的商品一致。此外，游戏、APP类产品需要填写APP ID，电商类型每次提交开户数不超过3个。开户提交的营业执照照片需为整个执照，内容清晰可见，不可涂改，二维码扫描后需跳转至正确的页面。电商落地页产品详情页不可以出现虚假倒计时、库存数量/实时观看人数等诱导用户倾向的信息。落地页推广的产品折扣不可大于等于50%，不可出现折扣倒计时等字样，不能出现弹窗。落地页网站所有页面（Banner、类目、产品、政策信息）要正常显示及跳转。推广网站需包含联系方式、隐私政策、物流政策、退换货政策等基本信息。粉丝页名称尽量与品牌或者推广网站一致的名称。粉丝页建设需要注意公布与推广的品牌或产品相符合的内容，简介部分一定要展示品牌的官网链接、联系方式和公司地址，使用品牌的logo作为粉丝页头像，发布内容时不要出现违规/不相关的广告。多条粉丝页请通过命名、语言、地区或贴文内容做出区分，相同的粉丝页内容易被判定为规避系统行为从而加大封户风险。最后，本节还提供了Facebook电商类被封常见原因的相关文档。

__data__.text:
Facebook开户审核注意点
####  
• OE填写的信息需要与营业执照的信息保持一致。（如：公司名称、社会统一信用代码、官网链接、主体英文名）；[](#oe-tian-xie-de-xin-xi-xu-yao-yu-ying-ye-zhi-zhao-de-xin-xi-bao-chi-yi-zhi-ru-gong-si-ming-cheng-she)  
####  
• 一个主体可推广多个产品，一个产品只能被某个主体推广。（例如：A产品对应的粉丝页和推广页用X主体开过户，则A产品的粉丝页和推广页无法用再Y主体开户）；[](#yi-ge-zhu-ti-ke-tui-guang-duo-ge-chan-pin-yi-ge-chan-pin-zhi-neng-bei-mou-ge-zhu-ti-tui-guang-li-rua)  
####  
• 推广规则：遵循“同个品牌/产品”的原则，即保持推广页和粉丝页的商品一致。（同一条OE内，不能粉丝页推广A产品，但落地页推广B产品）；[](#tui-guang-gui-ze-zun-xun-tong-ge-pin-pai-chan-pin-de-yuan-ze-ji-bao-chi-tui-guang-ye-he-fen-si-ye-de)  
####  
• 游戏、APP类产品需填写APP ID；[](#you-xi-app-lei-chan-pin-xu-tian-xie-app-id)  
####  
• 电商类型每次提交开户数不超过3个[](#dian-shang-lei-xing-mei-ci-ti-jiao-kai-hu-shu-bu-chao-guo-3-ge)  
####  
• 开户提交的营业执照照片需为整个执照，内容清晰可见，不可涂改，二维码扫描后需跳转至正确的页面。[](#kai-hu-ti-jiao-de-ying-ye-zhi-zhao-zhao-pian-xu-wei-zheng-ge-zhi-zhao-nei-rong-qing-xi-ke-jian-bu-ke)  
####  
• 电商落地页产品详情页不可以出现虚假倒计时、库存数量/实时观看人数等诱导用户倾向的信息。[](#dian-shang-luo-di-ye-chan-pin-xiang-qing-ye-bu-ke-yi-chu-xian-xu-jia-dao-ji-shi-ku-cun-shu-liang-shi)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FWiThAQQxNz3J8mrqcQ4i%2Ffb%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7%E5%AE%A1%E6%A0%B8%E7%82%B9.png?alt=media&token=c4cd5156-707c-42eb-a54d-efe237241381)  
####  
•落地页推广的产品折扣不可大于等于50%，不可出现折扣倒计时等字样，不能出现弹窗[](#luo-di-ye-tui-guang-de-chan-pin-zhe-kou-bu-ke-da-yu-deng-yu-50-bu-ke-chu-xian-zhe-kou-dao-ji-shi-den)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FfuyaDQrrzLUtVNqIU2Mk%2Ffb%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7%E5%AE%A1%E6%A0%B8%E7%82%B92.png?alt=media&token=84ada354-3fdd-4472-89d8-8e202776a347)  
####  
• 落地页网站所有页面（Banner、类目、产品、政策信息）要正常显示及跳转[](#luo-di-ye-wang-zhan-suo-you-ye-mian-banner-lei-mu-chan-pin-zheng-ce-xin-xi-yao-zheng-chang-xian-shi)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FmwqUwGvlv7JGLtmGjMFB%2Ffb%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7%E5%AE%A1%E6%A0%B8%E7%82%B93.png?alt=media&token=6fd5f16b-e259-40e4-83f1-c22c8d82cdcd)  
####  
• 推广网站需包含联系方式、隐私政策、物流政策、退换货政策等基本信息。（通常位于网站底部）[](#tui-guang-wang-zhan-xu-bao-han-lian-xi-fang-shi-yin-si-zheng-ce-wu-liu-zheng-ce-tui-huan-huo-zheng-c)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FvQ4Cs0x2pALmcLVeIrpM%2Ffb%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7%E5%AE%A1%E6%A0%B8%E7%82%B94.png?alt=media&token=1fdc7869-5517-4721-8260-be6e5b37023b)  
####  
•粉丝页名称尽量与品牌或者推广网站一致的名称。[](#fen-si-ye-ming-cheng-jin-liang-yu-pin-pai-huo-zhe-tui-guang-wang-zhan-yi-zhi-de-ming-cheng)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FFzJFG456SCAvMeawNTUW%2Ffb%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7%E5%AE%A1%E6%A0%B8%E7%82%B95.png?alt=media&token=93c151bf-3e0e-4f5e-87e0-adffc16d3b53)  
####  
•粉丝页建设[](#fen-si-ye-jian-she)  
• 粉丝页公布与推广的品牌或产品相符合的内容（至少3条原创帖子，系统自动更新的内容不包含在内）  
• 粉丝页简介部分一定要展示品牌的官网链接、联系方式和公司地址  
• 使用品牌的logo作为粉丝页头像（不可上传真实人物的头像）  
• 粉丝页发布内容时不要出现违规/不相关的广告  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FAfL13iG7Kz991CZ6Co0k%2Ffb%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7%E5%AE%A1%E6%A0%B8%E7%82%B96.png?alt=media&token=91b1f163-27eb-46cd-9696-3d3912a899df)  
####  
• 多条粉丝页请通过命名、语言、地区或贴文内容做出区分，相同的粉丝页内容易被判定为规避系统行为从而加大封户风险。[](#duo-tiao-fen-si-ye-qing-tong-guo-ming-ming-yu-yan-di-qu-huo-tie-wen-nei-rong-zuo-chu-qu-fen-xiang-to)  
####  
Facebook电商类被封常见原因具体可见文档[](#facebook-dian-shang-lei-bei-feng-chang-jian-yuan-yin-ju-ti-ke-jian-wen-dang)  
FB电商类常见被封原因点.pdf

metadata.section_summary: 本节主要介绍了如何申请Google开户。首先，用户可以通过两个入口进入Google开户申请页面，一个是在开户培育页选择Google Ads并点击立即开户按钮，另一个是在菜单栏点击开户管理和开户申请，然后选择Google Ads并点击开通申请按钮。接下来，用户需要按照系统提示填写申请表单，包括必填项和可选项，一条链接可以开3-5个户，最多5个。如果需要申请多个账户，可以点击“+”按钮增加。建议账户规范命名，如：“公司主体-日期-序号”。最后，提交成功后，系统会显示开户申请提交成功的提示。此外，还提供了Uniagency系统开户申请入口的链接和新手出海极速下户指引的视频链接。

__data__.text:
Google开户申请
##  
1\. 申请操作[](#1.-shen-qing-cao-zuo)  
###  
1.1. 进入Google开户申请[](#1.1.-jin-ru-google-kai-hu-shen-qing)  
####  
入口1:（开户培育页 - 下户前）[](#ru-kou-1-kai-hu-pei-yu-ye-xia-hu-qian)  
选择Google Ads，点击【立即开户】按钮，进入 Google平台开户申请页面。  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2F1jcRZoUTtUTFeDC7ukmq%2FGoogle%20Ads%20%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7.png?alt=media&token=76f39df8-ae3b-467b-8cb7-9b95ff8b6092)  
开户培育页 - Google Ads开户  
####  
入口2:[](#ru-kou-2)  
-   点击菜单栏【开户管理】—【开户申请】，进入开户申请页面。  
-   选择Google Ads，点击【开通申请】按钮，进入 Google平台开户申请页面。  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FT5UcAOrj0y8rdaQ08DQE%2Fimage.png?alt=media&token=7928e74b-c565-4e70-a141-386f839b5be6)  
###  
1.2. 填写申请表单[](#1.2.-tian-xie-shen-qing-biao-dan)  
-   按系统提示填写 Google 账户申请的各项内容:  
-   带“\*”为必填项；  
-   一条链接开3~5个户，最多5个；  
-   填写完毕后点击【确定】按钮。  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FQpSylvGpcyQfTuYDqWd5%2Fimage.png?alt=media&token=8588ec80-ec8b-4ec8-8dfa-98efd65dc0ad)  
-   如需申请多个账户，可以点击“**＋**”增加  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FhjSCvgpUMKPpH3FvQD9N%2F%E8%B0%B7%E6%AD%8C%E6%89%B9%E9%87%8F%E7%94%B3%E8%AF%B7%E8%B4%A6%E6%88%B7.png?alt=media&token=c12e2c8d-638f-4e9e-bfba-340a2b0b7b3a)  
建议账户规范命名，如：“公司主体-日期-序号”  
-   开户申请提交成功  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FkvGDxdHqhpzmvjMDiGlW%2Fimage.png?alt=media&token=c12a81d5-a1e5-438e-a7ab-3f6013165170)  
##  
Uniagency系统开户申请入口：[](#uniagency-xi-tong-kai-hu-shen-qing-ru-kou)  
登录UniAgency免费开户：[https://business.uniagency.net/#/login](https://business.uniagency.net/#/login)​  
##  
【新手出海】极速下户指引[](#xin-shou-chu-hai-ji-su-xia-hu-zhi-yin)  
详情可查看视频指引：[https://academy.uniagency.net/detail/l\_62e8c13de4b00a4f372e493d/4](https://academy.uniagency.net/detail/l_62e8c13de4b00a4f372e493d/4)​

metadata.section_summary: 本节主要介绍了Google电商类网站开户审核的标准和要点。首先，广告主需要自查11项通用项目，包括投放着陆页的可访问性、联系信息的真实性、运费的准确性、用户信息的安全性等。其次，提供了一份谷歌电商类网站开户自查清单，包括网站logo与域名的一致性、联系信息的完整性、配送政策的清晰性、退货和退款政策的明确性、隐私政策的可查看性、付款方式的清晰完善、外链的准确有效、付款流程的顺畅、网址栏的安全显示等。最后，还需要检查网站的基本信息和条款，包括公司成立年份、运营国家、运费说明、退换货地址或联系方式、退换货运费说明、支付方式和支付说明等。

__data__.text:
Google电商类网站开户审核标准
####  
符合标准是开户审核通过的第一步，本文章介绍的网站审核要点请各位广告主自查，尽量保证符合Google的要求，确保运营模式和网站属性安全健康，以期Google Ads投放审核顺利。[](#fu-he-biao-zhun-shi-kai-hu-shen-he-tong-guo-de-di-yi-bu-ben-wen-zhang-jie-shao-de-wang-zhan-shen-he)  
##  
一、通用自查项目（11项）：[](#yi-tong-yong-zi-cha-xiang-mu-11-xiang)  
-   广告账户中设置的投放着陆页可供任何地点访客访问  
-   联系我们页面，避免放入虚假的美国地址、海外仓地址、虚拟海外电话  
-   如果公司尚未有海外的注册实体, 请在网站上显示与工商执照显示一致的中国地址。若您被如信用卡支付等第三方公司要求在网站上，放入指定的海外地址,请先和谷歌的营销策略专家沟通  
-   网站提供的地址/电话/邮箱/信用卡等信息没有被使用到其它被封的网站上  
-   没办法提供精准运费的情况下，允许高估运费，但须在广告上通知说明  
-   运费需要包含在运输过程中的任何额外处理的费用  
-   安全合规地搜集用户信息，避免在付款流程中恶意盗取用户支付信息  
-   商业注册地址和关于我们页面上的地址不吻合  
-   检查网站是否有被转卖过  
-   自查是否存在虚假评论、虚假实时订单数据，切勿使用建站平台后台提供的夸大销售数据/销售结果/买家信息/ 买家定位/买家评论的小工具  
-   若网站使用第三方平台站针对产品的评论，需注明出处  
##  
二、谷歌电商类网站开户自查清单：[](#er-gu-ge-dian-shang-lei-wang-zhan-kai-hu-zi-cha-qing-dan)  
-   网站要有logo 并与域名一致  
-   1 Contact Information联系我们的页面：电话 / 邮箱 / 地址 - 至少要收录两个  
-   2 About us关于我们的页面：有效公司成立年份，真实公司运营国家  
-   3 Shipping Policy配送政策需要清晰全面且邮费需要详细清楚 运输信息页：运费说明，各国运达费用及时间信息  
-   4 Return & Exchange Policy 退货和退款政策必须清晰明确，同时方便查找 退换货说明页面：退换货地址或联系方式，退换货运费说明  
-   5 Privacy Policy----隐私政策 因为欧美市场对于个人信息的收集及应用非常重视，因此这条也需要包含在网站上且可查看  
-   6 Payment Method 付款说明页面：支付方式和支付说明。 付款方式清楚完善  
-   7 外链准确且有效 主页底部外链容易出错，可能存在跳转到其他账户或者到无效页面的情况。例如：社交媒体链接  
-   8 付款流程顺畅  
-   9 网址栏是否显示安全：网站是否使用SSL协议  
##  
三、检查网站基本信息&条款[](#san-jian-cha-wang-zhan-ji-ben-xin-xi-tiao-kuan)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FsaoK6tjZx4bFVYiUQJfT%2F%E6%A3%80%E6%9F%A5%E7%BD%91%E7%AB%99%E5%9F%BA%E6%9C%AC%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%26%E6%9D%A1%E6%AC%BE1.png?alt=media&token=b9d4150b-66c7-432e-ac17-537eac004207)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2Fw4UK5vamKLbJDeay10rR%2F%E6%A3%80%E6%9F%A5%E7%BD%91%E7%AB%99%E5%9F%BA%E6%9C%AC%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%26%E6%9D%A1%E6%AC%BE2.png?alt=media&token=fbaaf092-64f7-4c1a-b46b-eda9bfd19baf)  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2F07IY4OjzQtTKKJbqX7ps%2F%E6%A3%80%E6%9F%A5%E7%BD%91%E7%AB%99%E5%9F%BA%E6%9C%AC%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%26%E6%9D%A1%E6%AC%BE3.png?alt=media&token=1eabf516-9ac6-45d7-a2d1-a7ef1ae9aeb8)

![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FcLio6TNzNvc9CJlhZMDA%2F%E6%A3%80%E6%9F%A5%E7%BD%91%E7%AB%99%E5%9F%BA%E6%9C%AC%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%26%E6%9D%A1%E6%AC%BE5.png?alt=media&token=6f77469c-5d5d-41b8-b0b5-791f9d4560ac)

![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FIKr51PqU2ReTEHQmnqEs%2F%E6%A3%80%E6%9F%A5%E7%BD%91%E7%AB%99%E5%9F%BA%E6%9C%AC%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%26%E6%9D%A1%E6%AC%BE9.png?alt=media&token=9898c22b-72e6-4210-809d-099c57327e33)  
优秀案例：社交媒体可以正常跳转，并且显示名称与域名一致  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2F8BU6K3YvOlTubdzenktK%2F%E6%A3%80%E6%9F%A5%E7%BD%91%E7%AB%99%E5%9F%BA%E6%9C%AC%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%26%E6%9D%A1%E6%AC%BE7.png?alt=media&token=007d0a3b-1b0a-4bd1-a19f-3fc73fb5c71a)

metadata.section_summary: 本节主要介绍了如何在Tiktok上开设账户的申请流程。首先，用户可以通过两种方式进入Tiktok开户申请页面，一是通过开户培育页，二是通过菜单栏的开户管理。然后，用户需要按照系统提示填写Tiktok账户申请的各项内容，其中带“*”的为必填项。填写完毕后点击确定按钮，即可提交开户申请。此外，本节还提供了关于Tiktok个人号创建与商务中心使用的详细指南链接，以及新手出海极速下户的视频指引链接。

__data__.text:
Tiktok开户申请
##  
1\. 申请操作[](#1.-shen-qing-cao-zuo)  
###  
1.1 进入Tiktok开户申请[](#1.1-jin-ru-tiktok-kai-hu-shen-qing)  
####  
入口1:（开户培育页 - 下户前）[](#ru-kou-1-kai-hu-pei-yu-ye-xia-hu-qian)  
选择Tiktok For Business，点击【立即开户】按钮，进入 Tiktok 平台开户申请页面。  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FGRMqo72tosR6zMVb7Siy%2FTiktok%E5%BC%80%E6%88%B7.png?alt=media&token=2b16dba3-48c4-49be-b0e4-0a412bbd7e51)  
####  
入口2:[](#ru-kou-2)  
-   点击菜单栏【开户管理】—【开户申请】，进入开户申请页面。  
-   选择Tiktok，点击【开通申请】按钮，进入Tiktok平台开户申请页面。  
![](https://579691080-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F-MQVO1o_mm3qORxxorBf%2Fuploads%2FeQF1apn8d8hrXlYwkWaf%2Fimage.png?alt=media&token=1055d7fc-3366-4c4d-8947-7c53583e0180)  
###  
1.2. 填写申请表单[](#1.2.-tian-xie-shen-qing-biao-dan)  
-   按系统提示填写 Tiktok 账户申请的各项内容:  
-   带“\*”为必填项；

metadata.section_summary: 本节主要介绍了Snapchat的Public Profile功能，包括其定义和创建步骤。Public Profile是Snapchat上的官方主页，品牌可以在此展示专属内容和体验，增加内容价值和洞察分析，实现品牌影响力最大化。创建Public Profile的步骤分为两种情况：一是未注册账号且未开通企业主体的用户，需要先注册新账号，创建企业Org，选择国家和货币，最后创建Public Profile；二是已有账号且已开通企业主体的用户，需要登录Ads Manager，找到Public Profile并点击，然后根据提示创建和配置Public Profile。此外，还提供了一份Public Profile手册供用户参考。

__data__.text:
Snapchat Public Profile 介绍
###  
**什么是Public Profile？**[](#shen-me-shi-public-profile)  
【官方阐述】作为 Snapchat 上，免费创建、永久呈现的官方主页，品牌频道聚集品牌专属内容和体验，增量式展示内容价值和洞察分析，实现品牌影响力最大化。  
###  
**如何创建Public Profile？**[](#ru-he-chuang-jian-public-profile)  
####  
**若您未注册账号且未开通企业主体（**Business Organization**），请按照以下步骤操作**[](#ruo-nin-wei-zhu-ce-zhang-hao-qie-wei-kai-tong-qi-ye-zhu-ti-business-organization-qing-an-zhao-yi-xia)  
step1 注册信息填写：前往https://accounts.snapchat.com创建新账号，请认真填写First Name和Username，First Name将作为品牌展示名称在Profile页面展示，Username也会在Profile页面展示  
step2 创建企业Org：请认真填写Business Name，点击【下一步】  
step3 选择国家和货币：请认真填写广告投放的国家以及对应的币种，点击【下一步】  
step4 创建Public profile：点击【Create Public Profile】，在新企业Org下成功创建 Public Profile  
####  
**若您已有账号且已开通了企业主体（**Business Organization**），请按照以下步骤操作**[](#ruo-nin-yi-you-zhang-hao-qie-yi-kai-tong-le-qi-ye-zhu-ti-business-organization-qing-an-zhao-yi-xia-b)  
step1: 前往business.snapchat.com，使用具有Org Admin账户登陆 Ads Manager  
step2: 点击导航栏，找到【Public Profile】并点击，此时你将有两个选择项  
（1）点击【Create a Snapchat account】将为您创建新的账号并创建管理Public Profile，后续步骤可参考 未注册账号且未开通企业主体 的创建流程  
（2）点击【I already have a Snapchat account】将使用您已有的账号创建管理Public Profile  
step3 配置Public profile信息 ，有以下注意事项：  
（1）Profile 头像最小尺寸是 320 x 320 pixels (.PNG, .JPG, .JPEG)，最大图片尺寸是 2MB  
（2）在Bio处 填写品牌的宣传文案  
（3）上传物料，e.g. Lenses,Saved stories  
确认所填写的信息无误后，点击【 Create Profile】即可成功完成配置  
​  
Public Profile手册-钛动科技.pdf  
54MB  
PDF
